Package hac.ex4.controllers

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
hac.ex4.controllers.CustomerController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class CustomerController extends Object
Controller for customer pages.

  • Method Details

    • welcomePage

      @GetMapping("") public String welcomePage(org.springframework.ui.Model model, Principal principal)
      Get request to the main store page, presents the customer nav-bar, allows searching products by name, presents to the user top discounted products, and allows adding products to cart.
      Parameters:
      model - Model to add data to the view.
      Returns:
      View of the main store page.

    • performSearch

      @GetMapping("search") public String performSearch(@RequestParam String searchInp)
      Get request to search products database by name
      Parameters:
      searchInp - Name to search products by.
      Returns:
      Redirection to main store page.

    • resetSearch

      @GetMapping("resetSearch") public String resetSearch()
      Get request to reset search results.
      Returns:
      Redirection to the main store page.

    • shoppingCart

      @GetMapping("cart") public String shoppingCart(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Get request of shopping cart page, presents the items in the cart, allows emptying the cart, changing quantity of items, removing items, and checking out.
      Parameters:
      model - Model to add data to the view.
      Returns:
      View of the shopping cart page.

    • addToCart

      @PostMapping("addtocart/{id}") public String addToCart(@PathVariable long id)
      Post request to add item to cart.
      Parameters:
      id - id to add to cart.
      Returns:
      Redirection to main store page.

    • increase

      @PostMapping("increase/{id}") public String increase(@PathVariable long id)
      Post request to increase item quantity in cart.
      Parameters:
      id - id to add to cart.
      Returns:
      Redirection to cart page.

    • decrease

      @PostMapping("decrease/{id}") public String decrease(@PathVariable long id)
      Post request to decrease an item's quantity from the cart.
      Parameters:
      id - id to decrease the item's quantity by to cart.
      Returns:
      Redirection to cart page.

    • delete

      @PostMapping("delete/{id}") public String delete(@PathVariable long id)
      Post request to delete an item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      id - id to delete from cart.
      Returns:
      Redirection to cart page.

    • empty

      @PostMapping("empty") public String empty()
      Post request to empty the cart.
      Returns:
      Redirection to the cart page.

    • pay

      @GetMapping("pay") public String pay(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, Principal principal)
      Get request to perform purchase of the shopping cart's content. If succeeds make appropriate changes in the database and adds new payment to the payment database, empties the cart and redirects to main store page. otherwise redirects back to cart page with error message.
      Parameters:
      redirectAttributes - To pass success or fail messages.
      principal - To access user nam.e
      Returns:
      Redirects to cart page if purchase failed, to main store page otherwise
